channel.title: contact-center on a corner of a mind
channel.description: Recent content in contact-center on a corner of a mind

item.title: Intersystems Cache Database Drivers
item.description: I keep searching for this link to download ODBC drivers on google search but it does not show up. It is buried deep within some Avaya pages. So now I put it here for my ease of use. ftp://ftp.intersystems.com/pub/cache/odbc/ Also there are some resources that reference the below link for downloading other driver types (eg: JDBC) but the site is a pain to use during the times I have tested.

item.title: Avaya AACC - Reset WebAdmin password
item.description: Note: The password has been untested. Using Database.Net (or your favourite ODBC client)… Connect locally to CCMA_CACHE on the AACC server. Use credentials on Maxim Tsvetov’s Blog_ _ Open the APM.ccmUser table. Modify the User ID 1000 account password to 5767142366101EB6 Restart the whole server. Login with credentials webadmin/webadmin.
